summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3670 for the improvement of 1st Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Michigan Street; by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45221, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
